sales.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

displayProperties.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
displayProperties.name: Quick Launch

displayProperties.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
displayProperties.name: Volatile Launch

displayProperties.description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.
displayProperties.name: Proximity Grenades

displayProperties.description: Grenades fired from this weapon attach on impact and detonate when enemies are in proximity.
displayProperties.name: Sticky Grenades

displayProperties.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
displayProperties.name: Threat Detector

displayProperties.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
displayProperties.name: Quickdraw

costs.name: Legendary Shards
costs.description: Remnants of powerful items. Used to improve gear or trade for other items.
costs.source: Obtained from dismantling Legendary and Exotic quality items.

costs.name: Glimmer
costs.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.
costs.source: Obtained from many sources in the world.

  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

displayProperties.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.

displayProperties.name: Appended Mag

displayProperties.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.

displayProperties.description: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.

displayProperties.name: Timed Payload
